title: Here's to your health: alcohol
creator_credit: Craig Reardon, Robert Grant and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
brief_description: A program which aims to reduce alcohol consumption by addressing social and cultural aspects which influence teenagers to drink. The program also promotes some alcohol-free activities in the community.
creator_credit_for_label: Craig Reardon, Robert Grant and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
